name: Third-world country survival
description:
Survival without apocalypse, craft and other things!

You are an old homeless man in third world country. You have minimal support from government. Your chance is to find cheap food in the store to survive.

WSAD to move. Left and right mouse buttons to manipulate items.

Right click on food in your pocket to eat it. Look at expiration date. Don't eat spoiled food! 

Survive as long as you can in this harsh city.
